mav_sim.tools.transfer_function module¶

transfer function block (SISO)

class mav_sim.tools.transfer_function.TransferFunction(num: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], den: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], Ts: float)¶

Bases: object

Implements the transfer function for SISO system

f(state: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], u: float) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

Time domain dynamics

Parameters:

  • state – The state vector (column vector) of the system

  • u – The input of the system

Returns:

A column vector for the time derivative of the state

Return type:

xdot

h(u: float) → float¶

Output function

Calculates the output given the current state and input

y = Cx + Du

Parameters:

u – Input to the system

Returns:

Output of the system

Return type:

y

rk4_step(u: float) → None¶

Runge-kutta 4 discretized integration

Updates self.state based upon the input and the dynamics of the system
